title: The Bucket Strategy
description: Learn The Bucket Strategy in one minute.

hook.text: A retiree split her $1.2 million into three buckets and never worried about market crashes again.

twist.text: When stocks crash, you live off cash and bonds. By the time you need bucket three, markets recover.
